item.title: How do i rep people?and how do people rep me?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

When you Register on these Forums (You Did)
You auto registered with the same details at www.moparisthebest.com/smf
If you want to rep someone give the rep on that forum and the rep will be auto on these forums.
Its not working here atm, sorry for that.

But Rules are saying it.
No talking about rep, lucky im breaking rules specially for you to help.
Never doing that for people.
Well hope it works
Btw you need 20 Posts to rep someone else and you cant rep urself
You will see text “Rep++” under a person’s name and click on that

~God of Ikiliki

Read full topic

item.title: How do i rep people?and how do people rep me?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Purpose: Giving Rep++ when its not working, like now atm

Difficulty: 1

Assumed Knowledge: Over 20 Posts

Forum Base: MoparScape/Moparisthebest

Classes Modified: Moparscape.org and moparisthebest.com

Ok I know its a lil bit stupid but Il explain it.
Most people are thinking Rep++ is not working but it does.

Procedure
Step 1: Register an account on this Forum

Step 2: Go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf
Login with the Same Pass and Name.

Step 3: Search for the person you want to give Rep++ and find his post
Just click on Rep++ on www.moparisthebest.com and your profile will be auto saved to www.moparisthebest.com/smf
So Rep++ is still working, just not on this Forums

Credits: God of Ikiliki

Read full topic
